thread.section_title: Home Zone Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Home Zone Furniture | homezonefurniture.com | 17 of 135
thread.title: Belia
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Belia

author: Belia
title: Belia
text:
I wouldn't change anything about my experience. I quickly was given help and wasn't kept waiting. I also wasn't forced to buy anything. I was given enough time to be able to make my decision about what I wanted to buy.l
I was a little frustrated about the printer not working . I felt I was buying a car waiting for the paper work. Poor salesrep had to try to find one that did work. This was at the lewisville , Texas store. They should really make things easier for the sales individual.
